     <script>
      /*呈現所有圖案*/

        $(window).load(function () {
            var $imgs = $('#imgs'),
            $li = $imgs.find('li'),
            $img = $li.find('img');
            _width = $img.width();
            _height = $img.height();
            _margin = 47;

            $li.each(function (i) {
                var $this = $(this),
			_left = i * (_width + _margin);

                $this.css('left', _left).data('position', {
                    left: _left,
                    top: parseInt($this.css('top'), 10) || 0,
                });
            });

            $img.each(function (i) {
                var $this = $(this);
            });
            openTab(this.event, "Acdemic");
            $(".indexView__news__top ul li a").eq(0).css("background", "url('Content/images/img-news-item-hover.png') no-repeat");
            $(".indexView__news__top ul li a").eq(0).css("color", "#fff600");
        });

        /*頁籤、浮現圖片*/
        function openTab(evt, newsName) {

            $(".indexView__news__top ul li a").eq(0).removeAttr("style");
            var Allchick, chick, i, tabcontent, tablinks;
            Allchick = $("#imgs li img");
            Allchick.clearQueue();

            switch (newsName) {

                case "Acdemic":
                    chick = Allchick.eq(0);
                    break;

                case "FarmerTrain":
                    chick = Allchick.eq(1);
                    break;

                case "Results":
                    chick = Allchick.eq(2);
                    break;

                case "HireAnnounce":
                    chick = Allchick.eq(3);
                    break;

                case "TechTransfer":
                    chick = Allchick.eq(4);
                    break;
                case "Other":
                    chick = Allchick.eq(5);
                    break;
            }

            chick.animate({
                border: 'none',
                opacity: '0.8',
                position: 'relative',
                left: '40px',
                bottom: '3px',
            });

            Allchick.not(chick).animate({
                border: 'none',
                opacity: '0',
                position: 'relative',
                left: '40px',
                bottom: '-17px'
            });

            $(".allcontent").hide();
            tabcontent = document.getElementsByClassName("tabcontent");

            for (i = 0; i < tabcontent.length; i++) {
                tabcontent[i].style.display = "none";
            }

            tablinks = document.getElementsByClassName("tablinks");
            for (i = 0; i < tablinks.length; i++) {
                tablinks[i].className = tablinks[i].className.replace(" active", "");
            }

            document.getElementById(newsName).style.display = "block";
            evt.currentTarget.className += " active";
        }

        function Tab(evt, newsName) {

            $(".allcontent").hide();
            tabcontent = document.getElementsByClassName("tabcontent");

            for (i = 0; i < tabcontent.length; i++) {
                tabcontent[i].style.display = "none";
            }

            tablinks = document.getElementsByClassName("tablinks");
            for (i = 0; i < tablinks.length; i++) {
                tablinks[i].className = tablinks[i].className.replace(" active", "");
            }

            document.getElementById(newsName).style.display = "block";
            evt.currentTarget.className += " active";
        }

        var apiUrl = "https://www.googleapis.com/youtube/v3/search?part=snippet&channelId=UCaereJVO0kr0nJv1HiR11Iw&q=%E8%BE%B2%E6%A5%AD%E6%B0%A3%E8%B1%A1%E9%A0%90%E5%91%8A&relevanceLanguage=zh-hant&key=AIzaSyB6edfSgrHczqTypaYfSrSvWUoalxJowho";
        $.ajax({
            url: apiUrl,
            dataType: "jsonp",
            success: function (data) {
                $(".video").attr("href", "https://youtu.be/" + data.items[0].id.videoId);
                $(".video img").attr("src", data.items[0].snippet.thumbnails.medium.url);
                $(".video").attr("title", data.items[0].snippet.title);
            },
            error: function (jqXHR, textStatus, errorThrown) {
                //$(".updateVideo").attr("href", "http://video.coa.gov.tw/videos");
                //$(".updateVideo img").attr("src", "Content/images/img-weather.png");
            }
        });
     </script>
